input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
CafePress - Franklin Quote Liberty for Security Car Magnet 10 - Car Magnet 10 x 3, Magnetic Bumper Sticker

Product features:
Size: 10" x 3" rectangle
Printed on magnetic backed vinyl
Water and UV resistant inks
IMPORTED
input_text.Response A: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Travel in style with this car magnet! Add instant style to your vehicle with a vinyl car magnet. Magnetic backed vinyl car magnets stick to metal panels on your car or truck and are the perfect way to show the world how you feel. Use on cars, trucks, SUVs, campers, RVs, tool boxes, file cabinets, refrigerators, just about anyplace where a magnet will stick. Size: 10" x 3" rectangle. Printed on magnetic backed vinyl with water and UV resistant inks. Imported.
input_text.Response B: This CafePress - Franklin Quote Liberty for Security Car Magnet 10 - Car Magnet 10 x 3, Magnetic Bumper Sticker is printed on magnetic backed vinyl with UV and water-resistant inks. The magnet is a 10" x 3" rectangle. It is imported.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
